name: spreadsheetAddColumn
syntax: spreadsheetAddColumn(spreadsheetObj, data, startrow, startcolumn, insert [, insert])
description: Adds a column or column data to an Excel spreadsheet object.

examples.title: Tag Example
examples.code:
<cfscript>mySheet =   SpreadsheetNew( "Test" ); 
  writedump ("#mySheet#");   SpreadsheetAddColumn( mySheet,"MySingleColumn" ); // Add a row of data: a single value for the single column
    mySingleColumnValue="As you can see, this sentence contains commas, which force the value to be split over 3 columns instead of one."; 
     SpreadsheetAddRow( mySheet,mySingleColumnValue ); 
 writedump ("#mySheet#"); </cfscript>
